arts.ttl: Celtic mascot left deafened in amazing Champions League reaction as smirking Kasper Schmeichel laps up atmosphere
arts.sum: The Parkhead cauldron erupted before kick-off in the 5-1 rout of Slovan Bratislava

arts.ttl: The Brendan Rodgers premonition that Celtic proved right as flying Hoops set unwanted record straight
arts.sum: Our verdict from Parkhead as Celtic ran riot against Slovan Bratislava

arts.ttl: Joe Cole sees Celtic as Champions League 'non entity' no more as he spots clue they're set to THRIVE under new format
arts.sum: Cole raved about Celtic on the TNT Sports goals show after the game

arts.ttl: Slovan Bratislava boss reacts to what he witnessed at Celtic Park in Champions League
arts.sum: Celtic produced one of their best European performances in recent memory on Wednesday night, hammering Slovan Bratislava 5-1 in the Champions League. Speaking to TNT Sports after the match, Vladimir Weiss admitted that it is “not easy to play here” and lauded what the Celtic fans can do to a team.

arts.ttl: Jamie Carragher and Micah Richards’ brilliant reaction to Liam Scales' goal for Celtic in Champions League
arts.sum: Jamie Carragher and Micah Richards were working for CBS Sports when, at half-time, they were analysing the action from all the Champions League games. Celtic beat Slovan Bratislava in the Champions League

arts.ttl: World media crowns ‘beautiful’ Celtic the Champions League dominator as Arne Engles has top billing over 'crying' Slovan
arts.sum: The 5-1 demolition of the Slovakian champions caught the attention across the globe

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers jokes 'end Champions League now' as Celtic boss wants Bayern Munich final
arts.sum: Rodgers chuckled: "Yeah the competition stops now, we play Bayern Munich in the final! Brendan Rodgers has joked he wants the Champions League to end NOW for Celtic to face Bayern Munich in the final.

arts.ttl: Weiss admits 'silly comments' about Celtic in past as Rangers hero talks boos
arts.sum: But he acknowledged Brendan Rodgers' team played "fast, modern football" which he accepts was too much for his side on the night. They play fast, modern football and, yeah, it was too much for us tonight.

arts.ttl: Scott Brown delivers brutal assessment of old Rangers rival Vladimir Weiss as Celtic pundits blown away in Euro romp
arts.sum: The Hoops romped to an emphatic opening night victory in the east end of Glasgow against the Slovaks

arts.ttl: Ally McCoist reaction to Celtic opener missed by TV cameras as Rangers hero delivers one-liner to Peter Schmeichel
arts.sum: McCoist told the Manchester United legend 'it looked offside'
